name: Electro Mayhem
description:
Jack is the owner of a big electronics company but is betrayed by one of his employees. He planted a special chip in all recent manufactured devices and since all of them are smart, it makes them lose their minds which makes them turn violent and want to kill Jack no mater what. Defend yourself in this battle arena!

Make sure you don't run out of ammo for all weapons. The failsafe seems to not be working properly so I recommend getting the extra weapon slot as your first item

Muffled audio? Try running this game on microsoft edge or internet Explorer. Stencyl seems to be having issues playing decent audio on chrome and firefox.

Controls:
WASD = Movement
Mouse 1 = Fire Weapon, reload when empty
R = Reload manually
Q= Enter/Exit Shop, Call next wave early
E= Change weapon
